subject: Fw: Thank you, we are accepting your refinance debt request
body:
Your your credit report does not matter to us!
 
If your family OWN property and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is our best deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this offer will expire NOW):
 
$427,000+ debt
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
 
Hurry, when our best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this user-friendly form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
 
http://stelziuxister.com/
